abstract: Google names a sales executive in Europe to replace Tim Armstrong, who is leaving to become chief executive of AOL.
snippet: Google names a sales executive in Europe to replace Tim Armstrong, who is leaving to become chief executive of AOL.
lead_paragraph: Moving quickly to fill the void left by Tim Armstrong’s departure to AOL, Google said on Tuesday that Dennis Woodside, the company’s top sales executive in Britain and part of Europe, would become vice president for Americas operations.

headline.main: Google Gives Executive in Europe Top U.S. Sales Job
